item.title: 数据预处理
item.author: vllbc
item.description: 导入必要的包 import pandas as pd import numpy as np 读入数据 data = pd.read_csv("./datasets/Data.csv") data.head() Country Age Salary Purchased 0 France 44.0 72000.0 No 1 Spain 27.0 48000.0 Yes 2 Germany 30.0 54000.0 No 3 Spain 38.0 61000.0 No 4 Germany 40.0 NaN Yes 确定X,Y变量 X = data.iloc[:,:-1].values Y = data.iloc[:,3].values 数据空值处理
